summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Thrryv major updates. All 11 features tested successfully. Welcome page headline, mobile FAB, notifications, delete account modal, profile expandable sections, delete post, reputation boost display, and 250-word limit all working correctly.
passed_tests: Welcome page shows new headline 'Where Your Reputation Matters' - PASS
Mobile layout has floating action button (FAB) for New Claim - PASS
Mobile notifications bell icon visible in header - PASS
Mobile menu button visible - PASS
Notifications page accessible via bell icon in header - PASS
Settings page has Delete Account option - PASS
Delete Account confirmation modal opens correctly - PASS
Delete Account requires typing 'Delete Account' to enable confirm button - PASS
Confirm delete button disabled by default, enabled after correct text - PASS
Profile page has expandable Claims section - PASS
Profile page has expandable Annotations section - PASS
Claims on profile show reputation boost (+X.X) in green - PASS
Delete Post option available on user's own claims (via menu) - PASS
Feed shows reputation boost on posts (+X.X) in green - PASS
Strict 250-word limit enforced on claim creation - PASS
Word count display shows current/max words - PASS
'Exceeds word limit' warning shown when over 250 words - PASS
Submit button disabled when word limit exceeded - PASS
Claim creation works and shows AI-classified domain and truth label - PASS
New claims appear in feed with reputation boost displayed - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: All features implemented correctly and working as expected
data-testid attributes properly added for all interactive elements
Mobile FAB button may be partially obscured by 'Made with Emergent' badge in some cases - minor visual overlap
seed_data_creation: Created test claim during testing: 'According to recent scientific research published in Nature...'
context_for_next_testing_agent: All major updates tested and working. Test user testuser_e1@test.com has 3 claims and 1 annotation. Reputation score is 27. Mobile FAB button works but may have minor visual overlap with Emergent badge. AI evaluation modal only appears for claims that qualify for significant reputation boost.

notifications.notifications_page: Working - shows empty state or notifications list
notifications.mark_all_read: Working - button visible when unread notifications exist

settings_delete_account.delete_account_button: Working - visible in Danger Zone section
settings_delete_account.confirm_button_disabled: Working - disabled until correct text entered

profile_page.reputation_boost_display: Working - shows +X.X in green on claims
profile_page.delete_claim_button: Working - trash icon visible on own claims

feed.reputation_boost_display: Working - shows +X.X in green on cards
feed.delete_post_menu: Working - three-dot menu with Delete Post option

claim_creation.word_limit_warning: Working - 'Exceeds word limit' shown when over 250
